articles.title: Harrison Ford, 80, insists he 'never wanted to be rich and famous' - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'No one ever believes this, but I never wanted to be rich and famous,' he told People this week. 'I just wanted to be an actor.' He keeps making massive films that have made him rich.
articles.content:
Harrison Ford - who is reportedly worth more than $300million - never left carpentry and got into acting for the money.
